subject: World Series
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jacoby Ellsbury’s joining the Yankees is not the same as when other former Red Sox players such as Sparky Lyle, Roger Clemens and Wade Boggs went to New York and won titles.
snippet: Jacoby Ellsbury’s joining the Yankees is not the same as when other former Red Sox players such as Sparky Lyle, Roger Clemens and Wade Boggs went to New York and won titles.
